memberdef.name: _XRT_ENTRY
memberdef.initializer: { state, #at, cxv, rci_type, \ offsetof(sxa_node_t,sxa_field), \ sizeof((*(sxa_node_t *)NULL).sxa_field), \ SXA_CACHED_##group }

briefdescription.para: Table to map _xbee_rci_type_t to RCI type string.
Code related to the register descriptor table.

detaileddescription.para: The XBee register descriptor table is initialized here.

simplesect.para: sxa.h needs to be included before including this header.
This header is sensitive to the macro IDIGI_USE_XBEE. If defined, then extra fields are included in the table in order to support iDigi. Otherwise, the fields are omitted so as to save storage.
